channel.title: 7-40' on Moscow Migrant
channel.description: Recent content in 7-40' on Moscow Migrant

item.title: Igor Yakovenko: Putin's Koschei's Needle is Located in Crimea
item.description: This publication is an accurate transcription of one of the episodes from the “7-40” series on Igor Yakovenko’s channel. All information is reproduced without changes, except for corrections of errors in the automatic transcription. I would be grateful for any indications of inaccuracies or discrepancies with the original. Good morning, dear friends! My name is Igor Yakovenko. Today is December 3rd. It is currently 7:40 in Kyiv, and one hour later in Moscow.
